headline: Ford's Jim Farley Praises Trump For Being Easy To Work With, But Says Needs To Do More To Curtail China's Dominance: 'Car With Ten Cameras...'
summary: Ford Motor Co. (NYSE:F) CEO Jim Farley has shared that working with President Donald Trump has been a good experience, but there were still things that needed improvement. Trump Has Been Great To Work With, Says Jim Farley In an interview with Bloomberg on Thursday, the CEO hailed Trump for being "great to work with," and shared that "they [the Trump administration] always answer the phone." However, he shared that there was still some work to do, while hailing the administration's EPA changes a
